SELECT ( SELECT CRS_YEAR FROM tb_crs_crs TCC WHERE CRS_CD = ( SELECT CRS_CD FROM tb_crs_cre_crs TCCC WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd})) AS CRS_YEAR , ( SELECT CRS_TERM FROM tb_crs_crs TCC WHERE CRS_CD = ( SELECT CRS_CD FROM tb_crs_cre_crs TCCC WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd})) AS CRS_TERM , ( SELECT CRS_CRE_NM FROM tb_crs_cre_crs TCCC WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd}) AS CRS_CRE_NM , ( SELECT ENRL_START_DTTM FROM tb_crs_crs TCC WHERE CRS_CD = ( SELECT CRS_CD FROM tb_crs_cre_crs TCCC WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd})) AS ENRL_START_DTTM , ( SELECT ENRL_END_DTTM FROM tb_crs_crs TCC WHERE CRS_CD = ( SELECT CRS_CD FROM tb_crs_cre_crs TCCC WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd})) AS ENRL_END_DTTM , ( SELECT CODE_NM FROM tb_sys_code TSC WHERE CODE_CD = ( SELECT ENRL_STS FROM tb_std_std TSS WHERE STD_NO = #{stdNo}) AND CODE_CTGR_CD = 'ENRL_STS') AS ENRL_STS , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lec_exam WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND SEMI_EXAM_YN = 'N' AND REG_YN = 'Y' ) AS EXAM_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lec_exam WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND SEMI_EXAM_YN = 'Y' AND REG_YN = 'Y' ) AS SEMI_EXAM_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lec_asmt WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND REG_YN = 'Y' ) AS ASMT_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_crs_cre_crs_resh WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND REG_YN = 'Y' ) AS RESH_CNT
, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_std_std WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND ENRL_STS IN ('S', 'C', 'F') ) AS STD_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lec_asmt_send WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd}) AS ASMT_SEND_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lec_asmt_send WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND RATE_YN = 'Y') AS ASMT_RATE_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lec_exam_stare WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND EXAM_SN IN (SELECT EXAM_SN FROM tb_lec_exam TLE WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND REG_YN = 'Y' AND SEMI_EXAM_YN = 'N')) AS EXAM_ANSR_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lec_exam_stare WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND EXAM_SN IN (SELECT EXAM_SN FROM tb_lec_exam TLE WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND REG_YN = 'Y' AND SEMI_EXAM_YN = 'N') AND RATE_YN = 'Y') AS EXAM_RATE_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lec_exam_stare WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND EXAM_SN IN (SELECT EXAM_SN FROM tb_lec_exam TLE WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND REG_YN = 'Y' AND SEMI_EXAM_YN = 'Y')) AS SEMI_EXAM_ANSR_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lec_exam_stare WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND EXAM_SN IN (SELECT EXAM_SN FROM tb_lec_exam TLE WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND REG_YN = 'Y' AND SEMI_EXAM_YN = 'Y') AND RATE_YN = 'Y') AS SEMI_EXAM_RATE_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT STD_NO) FROM tb_crs_resh_ansr WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd}) AS RESH_JOIN_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_brd_qna_qstn WHERE QNA_CTGR_CD = 'LEC' AND CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} ) as BBS_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_brd_qna_qstn WHERE QNA_CTGR_CD = 'LEC' AND STS_CD = 'COMP' AND CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} ) as BBS_RATE_CNT , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL((SELECT COUNT(C.FILE_SN) from tb_lec_bbs_atcl B, tb_sys_file C where B.CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} and B.ATCL_SN = C.FILE_BIND_DATA_SN and B.BBS_CD = 'PDS' and C.REPO_CD ='LEC_BBS_ATCL')),0)AS PDS_CNT
, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lec_asmt_send WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND STD_NO = #{stdNo} ) AS ASMT_SEND_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lec_exam_stare WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND EXAM_SN IN (SELECT EXAM_SN FROM tb_lec_exam WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND REG_YN = 'Y' AND SEMI_EXAM_YN = 'N') AND STD_NO = #{stdNo} ) AS EXAM_ANSR_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lec_exam_stare WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND EXAM_SN IN (SELECT EXAM_SN FROM tb_lec_exam WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND REG_YN = 'Y' AND SEMI_EXAM_YN = 'Y') AND STD_NO = #{stdNo} ) AS SEMI_EXAM_ANSR_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_lec_resh_ansr WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND STD_NO = #{stdNo} ) AS RESH_JOIN_CNT , FN_GET_SCORE_ASMT(#{crsCreCd}, #{stdNo}) AS ASMT_SCORE , FN_GET_SCORE_EXAM(#{crsCreCd}, #{stdNo}, 'N') AS EXAM_SCORE , FN_GET_SCORE_EXAM(#{crsCreCd}, #{stdNo}, 'Y') AS SEMI_EXAM_SCORE , FN_GET_CRS_STD_PRGR(#{crsCreCd}, #{stdNo}) AS PRGR_RATIO , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_brd_qna_qstn WHERE QNA_CTGR_CD = 'LEC' AND CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND USER_NO = (select USER_NO from tb_std_std where STD_NO = #{stdNo})) as BBS_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_brd_qna_qstn WHERE QNA_CTGR_CD = 'LEC' AND STS_CD = 'COMP' AND CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND USER_NO = (select USER_NO from tb_std_std where STD_NO = #{stdNo}) ) as BBS_RATE_CNT

SELECT CONCAT(FN_GET_DATE_FORMAT((select ENRL_START_DTTM from tb_crs_crs tcc where CRS_CD = (select CRS_CD from tb_crs_cre_crs tccc where CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd})),'%Y-%m-%d'),' ~ ', FN_GET_DATE_FORMAT((select ENRL_END_DTTM from tb_crs_crs tcc where CRS_CD = (select CRS_CD from tb_crs_cre_crs tccc where CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd})),'%Y-%m-%d')) as enrlDuration
, FN_GET_DATE_FORMAT((select TERM_END_DTTM from tb_crs_crs tcc where CRS_CD = (select CRS_CD from tb_crs_cre_crs tccc where CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd})),'%Y-%m-%d') as termEndDttm , FN_GET_CRS_STD_PRGR(#{crsCreCd},#{stdNo}) as prgrRatio , DATEDIFF(FN_GET_DATE_FORMAT((select ENRL_END_DTTM from tb_crs_crs tcc where CRS_CD = (select CRS_CD from tb_crs_cre_crs tccc where CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd})),'%Y-%m-%d'),FN_GET_DATE_FORMAT((select ENRL_START_DTTM from tb_crs_crs tcc where CRS_CD = (select CRS_CD from tb_crs_cre_crs tccc where CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd})),'%Y-%m-%d')) as termDayCnt , DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'),FN_GET_DATE_FORMAT((select ENRL_START_DTTM from tb_crs_crs tcc where CRS_CD = (select CRS_CD from tb_crs_cre_crs tccc where CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd})),'%Y-%m-%d')) as nowDayCnt

/* SQL ID : MainLectureMapper.listUnScoreStatus 설 명 : 미채점 현황 리스트 과정,시험,과제 성적 리스트별 정보를 가져온다 */ select A.CRS_CRE_CD , A.CRS_CD , A.CRE_YEAR , A.CRE_TERM , A.CRS_CRE_NM , E.DECLS_NO , F.ENRL_APLC_START_DTTM , F.ENRL_APLC_END_DTTM , F.ENRL_START_DTTM , F.ENRL_END_DTTM , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(A.NOP_LIMIT_YN),'N') AS NOP_LIMIT_YN , A.ENRL_NOP , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(A.EDU_PRICE),0) AS EDU_PRICE , A.SCORE_HANDL_CD , A.CPLT_SCORE , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(A.PRGR_RATIO),0) AS PRGR_RATIO , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(A.ATTD_RATIO),0) AS ATTD_RATIO , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(A.EXAM_RATIO),0) AS EXAM_RATIO , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(A.FORUM_RATIO),0) AS FORUM_RATIO , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(A.ASMT_RATIO),0) AS ASMT_RATIO , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(A.PRJT_RATIO),0) AS PRJT_RATIO , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(A.JOIN_RATIO),0) AS JOIN_RATIO , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL(A.ETC_RATIO),0) AS ETC_RATIO , A.DAY_STUDY_LIMIT , A.REG_NO , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.REG_NO) ) AS REG_NM , A.REG_DTTM , A.MOD_NO , (SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.MOD_NO) ) AS MOD_NM , A.MOD_DTTM , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL((SELECT COUNT(B.STD_NO) FROM tb_std_std B WHERE B.CRS_CRE_CD = A.CRS_CRE_CD AND B.DECLS_NO = E.DECLS_NO AND B.ENRL_STS IN('S','C','F'))),0)AS STD_CNT , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(B.EXAM_SN SEPARATOR '|') FROM tb_lec_exam B WHERE B.CRS_CRE_CD = A.CRS_CRE_CD AND B.REG_YN = 'Y' AND B.SEMI_EXAM_YN = 'N' )AS EXAM_SN , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(B.EXAM_SN SEPARATOR '|') FROM tb_lec_exam B WHERE B.CRS_CRE_CD = A.CRS_CRE_CD AND B.REG_YN = 'Y' AND B.SEMI_EXAM_YN = 'Y') AS SEMI_EXAM_SN , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(B.ASMT_SN SEPARATOR '|') FROM tb_lec_asmt B WHERE B.CRS_CRE_CD = A.CRS_CRE_CD AND B.REG_YN = 'Y' )AS ASMT_SN , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(B.FORUM_SN SEPARATOR '|') FROM tb_lec_forum B WHERE B.CRS_CRE_CD = A.CRS_CRE_CD AND B.FORUM_REG_YN = 'Y')AS FORUM_SN , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_brd_qna_qstn WHERE QNA_CTGR_CD = 'LEC' AND CRS_CRE_CD = A.CRS_CRE_CD) as BBS_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_brd_qna_qstn WHERE QNA_CTGR_CD = 'LEC' AND CRS_CRE_CD = A.CRS_CRE_CD AND STS_CD = 'COMP') as BBS_RATE_CNT , IFNULL(FN_GET_NULL((SELECT COUNT(C.FILE_SN) from tb_lec_bbs_atcl B, tb_sys_file C where B.CRS_CRE_CD = A.CRS_CRE_CD and B.ATCL_SN = C.FILE_BIND_DATA_SN and B.BBS_CD = 'PDS' and C.REPO_CD ='LEC_BBS_ATCL')),0)AS PDS_CNT , F.CRS_NM , F.SCORE_OPEN_START_DTTM , F.SCORE_OPEN_END_DTTM FROM tb_crs_cre_crs A INNER JOIN tb_crs_crs F ON A.CRS_CD = F.CRS_CD INNER JOIN tb_crs_cre_crs_decls E ON A.CRS_CRE_CD = E.CRS_CRE_CD INNER JOIN tb_crs_cre_crs_tch D ON A.CRS_CRE_CD = D.CRS_CRE_CD AND D.USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY F.ENRL_END_DTTM DESC
